description.narrative: Advance the private sector engagement to finance, support and implement technically sound and financially viable risk-informed mitigation and adaptation actions in Viet Nam NDC

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

1. 01 supporting facilities functioned to support private sector business in investing in Agriculture NDC measures - Completed/on track, 01 in placed and 01 finalized. - 01 project facility functioned in two provinces on providing green technology practices of renewable energy or energy efficient, water saving and green processing chains for agriculture productions; - 01 financial facility on direct lending support regulation/policy are being finalized by MPI. The two facilities are to support private sector business in investing in Agriculture NDC measures
2. Number of trainings introduced to support businesses in development of pipeline investment projects toward climate smart and green businesses Completed/On track: - 02 orientation/training was provided online to Provincial Cooperatives in Binh Thuan and Bac Lieu to provide orientation on green business operation; green e-commerce with some piloting - 02 Technical workshops with local businesses and cooperatives in Binh Thuan in April and Bac Lieu in Aug (on-line) to discussed on potential business cooperation was organized and recommendation on future training to strengthen the business in 2022 - 02 technical training on green model development for eco-shrimp and mangrove models in Bac Lieu for 60 farmers (20% is female participants)
3. 02 business models in the supply chains for Agriculture get supported On track with some adjusted progress: - 03 dragon fruit model/cooperatives get supported for livestreaming to promote green and global Gap fruits to domestic markets - 01 business model on sustainable low carbon shrimp rice production toward organic practice supported. The model was the best qualified for support from the green shrimp contest; - 04 more shrimp models were selected for project support but pending operation due to COVID19 impacts - 03 Green dragon fruit cooperatives/models using low carbon and resilient farming technologies were identified but the operation was delayed due to Covid 19 impacts and are ready to operate soonest
4. 01 firm in agriculture supply chains get access to finance and supporting facilities from MPI SME Fund On track with adjusted progress: - There was 01 cooperative/model for Bac Lieu green eco shrimp-rice farming with co-funding from local cooperative members to operationalize their initiative in 2021 (of 1.5billion VND co-finance) - The regulation for SMEDF directly funding with green investments was drafted but not yet approved. Funding therefore was delayed for operation.
6. 01 Private Sector Advisory Network established link with NDC IP Progress with adjustment of COVID context and impacts - 01 consultation workshop on roles of private sector in NDC and Viet Nam NCCS with line ministries and medium/large scale businesses in Viet Nam in Dec. This is a part of projects support to the NCCS development to implement Viet Nam NDC, the project support to assess the key bottlenecks and opportunities for private sector engagement in the NDC. Base on the report, a roadmap and a network of private sector for NDC in Viet Nam might be initiated in fuller potential
7. 01 Investment Forum for NDC as part of NDC Implementation Plan Delayed. The activity is delayed by MARD due Government extended process for NDC implementation planning and NCCS finalization
9. (not yet) - Transparency platform established for large emitter firms/supply chains, particularly those who are highly consuming the energy and environment resources
